mart.embed-description: Do you want to sell or buy items? Choose with the buttons below!
mart.buy-desc:
Select below which items you want to buy.
Your Wallet: {{emojis.gold}} **{{money.gold}}**, {{emojis.silver}} **{{money.silver}}** and {{emojis.bronze}} **{{emojis.bronze}}**
mart.buy-items: You bought **{{items}}** for **{{money.gold}}** gold coins, **{{money.silver}}** silver coins and * *{{money.bronze}}** bronze coins
mart.sell-items: You sold **{{count}}** item for `{{money.bronze}}` bronze coins, `{{money.silver}}` silver coins and `{{money.gold}}` coins gold
mart.sell-items-plural: You sold **{{count}}** items for `{{money.bronze}}` bronze coins, `{{money.silver}}` silver coins and `{{money.gold}}` coins gold
mart.sell-base-text: Choose below all the items you want to sell. Here are the values ​​of your inventory items

first.title: Boleham Guild
first.no-available-quests: You don't have any quests available!
first.no-daily: There was an error viewing your daily quests
first.description: Welcome to the Boleham Guild! Here you can do world quests to evolve and help villagers on quests that risk their lives for money! Here are your missions! If you want to search for more quests or look for a job, you can do it all choosing below!

second.taken: You started the quest **{{name}}**! Good luck
second.description: Choose a mission to do below. Note that after choosing a mission, you can only get another one when you finish it.

training_camp.title: Training Camp
training_camp.description: Welcome to training camp! Here you can fight small monsters to train your powers. The training ground is safe, you will battle one, and only one monster.
